value.description: Developed alongside the MCIW program the M95 can be adapted to a variety of roles including infantry rifle, LMG and DMR configurations.

value.description: Advanced barrel attachment increases rate of fire and damage. High recoil. Used by unconventional, cybernetic mercenaries and special forces; unleashes an impressive amount of fire with scatter or triplex ammunition.

ModularWeapons.ModularPartDef.label: accelerator barrel extended
ModularWeapons.ModularPartDef.description: Advanced barrel attachment includes an extended barrel and bipod. High recoil. Used by unconventional, cybernetic mercenaries and special forces; unleashes an impressive amount of fire with scatter or triplex ammunition.

ModularWeapons.ModularPartDef.label: accelerator barrel LMG
ModularWeapons.ModularPartDef.description: Advanced barrel attachment includes an extended barrel, drum magazine and bipod. High recoil. Used by unconventional, cybernetic mercenaries and special forces; unleashes an impressive amount of fire with scatter or triplex ammunition.

ModularWeapons.ModularPartDef.label: Recoil control module
ModularWeapons.ModularPartDef.description: Counterweights and gas direction reduces muzzle climb and reduce rate-of-fire.

ModularWeapons.ModularPartDef.label: LMG Reciever/Belt (350rn)
ModularWeapons.ModularPartDef.description: Heaviest reciever made for sustained fire. Uses 350-round belts.

ModularWeapons.ModularPartDef.label: ETC LMG Reciever/Belt (350rn)
ModularWeapons.ModularPartDef.description: Heaviest reciever made for sustained fire. Uses 350-round belts.

value.description: Heavier tuned reciever which incorporates plasteel construction. Slight increase in accuracy, weight and recoil reduction.
Heaviest reciever made for sustained fire. Uses 100-round belts.
Heavier plasteel reciever. Fair increase in accuracy, weight and recoil reduction.
Heavier plasteel reciever. Increased damage, weight and reduced recoil.
Heaviest reciever made for sustained fire. Uses 100-round belts of advanced ammunition.
